meanings.definition: A semiconductor device with two terminals, typically allowing the flow of current in one direction only.
meanings.sent1: The diodes in the circuit ensure electricity flows in the right direction.
meanings.sent2: Engineers use diodes to control the flow of electricity in electronic devices.
meanings.sent3: The diodes at the party only let positive vibes in!
meanings.sent4: Her smile acted like diodes, guiding his emotions in a positive direction.
meanings.sent5: The diodes acted as traffic lights for the electrons, directing them along the circuit.

meanings.definition: A device that transmits current in one direction only, used in electrical circuits.
meanings.sent1: The diodes prevent current from flowing backward in the system.
meanings.sent2: Electricians rely on diodes to ensure electricity flows correctly.
meanings.sent3: The diodes in the game only allowed players to move forward.
meanings.sent4: His words were like diodes, pushing her towards a positive decision.
meanings.sent5: The diodes acted as gatekeepers, allowing only one-way traffic for electrons.
